Uses of Class
entity.Bullet

Packages that use Bullet 
Package Description
entity  

  • Uses of Bullet in entity

    Methods in entity that return Bullet 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Bullet BulletPool.getBullet​(int positionX, int positionY, int speed)
    Returns a bullet from the pool if one is available, a new one if there isn't.
    Method parameters in entity with type arguments of type Bullet 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void BulletPool.recycle​(Set<Bullet> bullet)
    Adds one or more bullets to the list of available ones.
    void EnemyShipFormation.shoot​(Set<Bullet> bullets)
    Shoots a bullet downwards.
    boolean Ship.shoot​(Set<Bullet> bullets)
    Shoots a bullet upwards.
